tool_description: An API that generates a random League of Legends Character with some of their descriptions.
title: League of Legends Character Generator

api_list.name: Get League of Legends Character
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return back a random league of legends character with their descriptions including: 
- title
- age
- region of origin
- primary lane
- release date
- gender
- race
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-character-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-character-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
